TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataListDesigner Inherits TemplatedControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider, IDataSourceProvider
type BaseDataListDesigner = class inherit TemplatedControlDesigner interface IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface IDataSourceProvider

Docs.summary: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.

Docs.related: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object. Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.

Docs.summary: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
Docs.value: The designer for the data source of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class. The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSourceID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSourceID : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
Docs.value: A that is the data source ID of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Setting the designer's <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the associated control to be set. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DesignerView As DesignerDataSourceView

Docs.summary: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
Docs.value: The representing the default view of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object. If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `DesignTimeHtmlRequiresLoadComplete` property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource> property is non-empty.

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object. It finally calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> base method.

Docs.summary: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.

If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

Docs.param: A control derived from the , which implements an .
Docs.summary: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void InvokePropertyBuilder(int32 initialPage) cil managed
Protected Friend Sub InvokePropertyBuilder (initialPage As Integer)

Docs.param: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
Docs.summary: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.

Docs.param: An object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormat%2A> method is obsolete and has no functionality.

Public Overrides Sub OnAutoFormatApplied (appliedAutoFormat As DesignerAutoFormat)

Docs.param: A object that defines a style.
Docs.summary: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class. A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
A designer can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs e);

Docs.param: The that is the source of the event.
A that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes. Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.

Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class. It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed
abstract member OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit override this.OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.

Docs.summary: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged() cil managed

Docs.summary: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.

block.para: The method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the class.

Docs.param: A collection implementing an interface of the added and shadowed properties.
Docs.summary: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.

block.para: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.

Docs.related: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode
